Tour.ViewRowEvolutionDescription: Row evolution shows you the current & past metric data for any row in any report.
Tour.ViewVisitsLogDescription: The visits Log shows you all the individual visits and actions each visitor took on your site.
Tour.ViewVisitorProfileDescription: The visitor log helps you to understand your visitors’ individual behavior by summarizing and listing your visitors’ visits.
Tour.ShareAllChallengesCompleted: Just unlocked the %1$s achievement by completing all Matomo challenges.
Tour.ChallengeCompleted: Congratulations, you have completed this challenge.
Tour.YouCanCallYourselfExpert: You can now call yourself a true %1$sMatomo Expert%2$s.
Tour.StatusLevel: You are currently a %1$s. Complete %2$s more challenges and you become a %3$s.
Tour.ConfigureGeolocationDescription: Ensure the location of your visitors is correctly detected.
Tour.DisableBrowserArchiving: Disable browser archiving for better performance
Tour.CustomiseDashboardDescription: You can add new widgets to your Dashboard, to ensure it reports on all of your most important metrics.
Tour.DefineGoalDescription: Conversion tracking is a great way to identify whether you are meeting your current business objectives, identify new objectives, view and analyse your performance, and learn how to increase your conversions, conversion rates, and revenue per visit.
Tour.CompletionMessage: You have completed all the challenges. Give yourself a pat on the back.
Tour.Part1Title: Welcome to Matomo. This widget helps you become a Matomo expert. You can skip any challenge or completely remove the widget when you hover the widget title.
Tour.Part2Title: You are doing great on your way to become a Matomo expert, keep on going.
Tour.Part3Title: Great progress! If you continue like this, you become an expert in no time!
Tour.Part4Title: Great progress! Only a few more challenges to complete.
Tour.OnlyVisibleToSuperUser: Only you as a %1$sSuper User%2$s can see this widget.
